full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` PHYAG RDOR SGO NAS PANYDZA RAKshA'I BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES BYA BA GVA LNGA BZLOG BSGYUR GYIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU'I ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PANTIT BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU 'KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, SA SKYE PAn CHEN GYI LAS MTSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIB PAR BGYIS PA 'DRIR DGE BA YOD DE, DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU'I SKU TSE RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PA DANG, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG YAN LAG GI PHYI NANG BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS, PHAN PA DANG BDE BA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,)
